text: Mr. Jones at the Ball is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithMr. Jones at the BallBernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Mack Sennett. ==Actors== * John R. Cumpson as Mr. Jones * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Jones * Mack Sennett as Butler / Policeman * George Gebhardt as Man in Blackface / Guest at Ball * Charles Inslee as Guest at Ball * Arthur V. Johnson as Guest * Jeanie MacPherson as Guest at Ball * Harry Solter as Guest at Ball * Marion Sunshine as Guest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Mr. Jones at the Ball
